name: clip-recap-pipeline
description: Daily Twitch clips to blog recap pipeline using Cloudflare Workers

scripts.dev:info: echo 'Local dev server starts on random port (check terminal output)' && echo 'Secrets are NOT available in local dev - use production for testing integrations' && wrangler dev
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:twitch
scripts.test:local: echo '⚠️  Local tests will fail - secrets not available in local dev' && echo 'Use: WORKER_URL=http://localhost:PORT npm run test:all' && echo 'Or test against production: npm run test:all'
